purpose: Enhance the memory and knowledge retention capabilities of autonomous agents
principle: Leverages knowledge graphs and multi-agent systems to create an efficient memory layer for agent systems
reusability: Designed as a plug-and-play component for agent frameworks, offering APIs for easy integration
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited support for complex memory structures and real-time updates
name: Memary
description: The Open Source Memory Layer For Autonomous Agents
highlight: Provides a memory layer specifically designed for enhancing the capabilities of autonomous agents
